imdb.plot outline: Shawn Thomas, a Speedy Pizza delivery guy, can barely make ends meet. An old friend Candice Sharpe convinces Shawn he can make extra cash by filling in for a male escort who failed to show up for a friend's dinner meeting. With success of this outing, Shawn and Candice decide to start their own escort service. From dressing as fury animals to indecent proposals, the requests from eager clientele gradually become more ridiculous - but Shawn can't walk away from the money. Expanding the business, Shawn's co- worker Roberto, an old college roommate Max and Shawn's brother-in-law Corey, join the hustle. With Candice as their pimp and no proper training, this odd bunch of regular Joe's must learn to adapt to an unfamiliar world of male escorts.
imdb.title: Bad Escorts
